About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Passionate about working on the applications of Computer Science and Mathematics for solving real world problems. Part of various developer communities and organizer of events at college Techfest. Pursuing Bachelors Degree in Computer Engineering, the journey has been backed by numerous wins at Coding Competetions.

With a keen interest & experience in Full Stack Development, I am open for any contributions, meetups and projects. Would appreciate any sort of collaboration!

EDUCATION

  • Bachelors in Computer Engineering
    (Pimpri Chinchwad College Of Engineering)
  • Diploma in Computer Engineering
    (Government Polytechnic Pune)

ACHIEVEMENTS

  • Runner-Up at Clash of Codes(Technofest 2020)
  • Runner-Up at Reverse Coding(Techlons 2019)
  • Runner-Up at Bug Zapper(Specktra 2k18)
  • Runner up at Blind Coding(ISTE Student Chapter)

KNOWLEDGE
